column4: first timer using ubuntu, someone free to help with an internet connection issue?
what is the issue?
can you connect to other networks? or at least be prompted for a passphrase?
I've had that issure recently with the 10.4 release myself
service network-manager restart fixes it sometimes, others a reboot
I've tried doing it manually after stopping network-manager to no avail. there is a bug, somewhere, for sure
you can also try /etc/init.d/dbus restart to fix your wifi connect issues
that came up a few times when i was googling, still no luck, its a wpa2-personal passworded/encrypted connection if that helps :S
did it ever connect to this AP?
are you saying you can't get your device to work under windows?
ok. what is the model number of the device?
what is the WIRELESS device in your laptop? use lcpci to figure it out
my bad. lspci
figure out what is you wifi chip based on that
i found 06:00.0 network conntroller: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. Device 8172 (rev 10) is that what i was looking for?
that is your 10/100 on board NIC, not wireless
iwconfig <-- any interfaces?
so your device sees other Ap's
i cant say, theres no others in my area to test with
i cant say, theres no others in my area to test with
